name: Gallinator
description:
20 levels of platform retro grame!

Nice graphics and easy to play.
For all ages.

How to play:
Gallinator will bounce side to side.
Tap on the screen to jump on the platforms.
Gallinator must collect all the white eggs and go home before time runs out. 
Collect all the gold eggs to be a chicken legend.
Devil-Fox will try to steal all your eggs so you must jump on him to destroy him.
Fast food makes you slow.
Good food makes you fast and invincible.
Collect clocks to gain time.
Ice creams freezes you and makes you invincible for a while.

by www.javireco.com
